variable.title: Drill: Flurry of Flowers Clean Up Op
variable.description: At this portal you can conduct drills to prepare for battles to come. This trigger recreates a battle at Cryano Cliffs at West Aelio. Make use of your battle skills to defeat the enemies, including the large FORMERS.

aelioTroopers.title: Aelio Troopers
aelioTroopers.description: This is a Battledia, where ARKS defenders can test their combat abilities. Make use of your battle skills to defeat all of the enemies.
